import React from 'react' import { useTranslation } from 'lib/../i18n' import { EmailSignup } from 'lib/components/EmailSignup' import IconEmail from 'assets/images/icon-glossy-email@2x.png' export const AccountEmailSignup = () => { const { t } = useTranslation() return <>
{t('getPrizeWinningNotificationsByEmail')}
}
